summary: This bill, the Hatchie River Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2025, proposes to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act. It designates a 163-mile segment of the Hatchie River in Tennessee for a study to determine its suitability for inclusion in the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. The Secretary of the Interior is tasked with conducting the study, involving partnerships with stakeholders, and submitting a report to Congress within three years of funding being made available.
